title: How to Rebalance
body: So wanted to test GP's real barrel power against a 650 armor malphite (thornmail inlcuded) so a full crit gp with trinforce takes 4 barrels to kill malphite how are are ppl saying GP barrels are not broken when its basicly a built in LW into his kit u might aswell give him an extra item slot imo take the 40% armor pen and make it like 15% early game with no crit or damage and he can still fk u up even with a tank rune build. Darius next imo needs his passive ad boost lowered or removed i say this due to the fact is u build a damage and trinforce build on him when his passive goes off he has about 650-750 ad depending on build with the one i tested i had 683 u combine this with his w and a trin proc and u will insta kill basicly any adc in the game. it seems like riot does not care for the fact this game is dying and is due to ppl hating the fact that riot cant balance a glass of fken water if they had to they talk about balance but never take opinions from ppl or from the actual top playing pros i think riot as basicly become Aeria Games Jr and has just become about milking money from players and then giving them the finger and on top of all this giving fiora hp% true damage every 3-5 seconds? wtf how did u think this way balanced in anyway or even building an ad mord? yea he squishy but get some atk speed and he gets all 3 q off faster then u can say wat and ur dead his final q is like 400% ad scaling ( totally balanced)  thats all ima say let the raging in this post commence
